name: Interface System.Logger
text:
System.Logger instances log messages that will be
 routed to the underlying logging framework the LoggerFinder uses.

 System.Logger instances are typically obtained from
 the System class, by calling
 System.getLogger(loggerName)
 or System.getLogger(loggerName, bundle).

methods.description: Returns the name of this logger.

Checks if a message of the given level would be logged by
 this logger.

methods.method_sig:
default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 String msg)

default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 Supplier<String> msgSupplier)
methods.description:
Logs a lazily supplied message.

 If the logger is currently enabled for the given log message level
 then a message is logged that is the result produced by the
 given supplier function.  Otherwise, the supplier is not operated on.

methods.method_sig:
default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 Object obj)
methods.description:
Logs a message produced from the given object.

 If the logger is currently enabled for the given log message level then
 a message is logged that, by default, is the result produced from
 calling  toString on the given object.
 Otherwise, the object is not operated on.

methods.method_sig:
default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 String msg,
                 Throwable thrown)
methods.description: Logs a message associated with a given throwable.

methods.method_sig:
default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 Supplier<String> msgSupplier,
                 Throwable thrown)
methods.description:
Logs a lazily supplied message associated with a given throwable.

 If the logger is currently enabled for the given log message level
 then a message is logged that is the result produced by the
 given supplier function.  Otherwise, the supplier is not operated on.

methods.method_sig:
default void log (System.Logger.Level level,
                 String format,
                 Object... params)
methods.description: Logs a message with an optional list of parameters.

methods.method_sig:
void log (System.Logger.Level level,
         ResourceBundle bundle,
         String msg,
         Throwable thrown)
methods.description:
Logs a localized message associated with a given throwable.

 If the given resource bundle is non-null,  the msg
 string is localized using the given resource bundle.
 Otherwise the msg string is not localized.

methods.method_sig:
void log (System.Logger.Level level,
         ResourceBundle bundle,
         String format,
         Object... params)
methods.description:
Logs a message with resource bundle and an optional list of
 parameters.

 If the given resource bundle is non-null,  the format
 string is localized using the given resource bundle.
 Otherwise the format string is not localized.
